  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4679</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Smoke Detector/Alarm</string>
            <string language="es">Detector/Alarma de humos</string>
            <string language="ga">Brathadóir/Aláram Deataigh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rauch Detector/Alarm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fumée Detector/Alarm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fumo Detector/Alarm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fumo Detector/Alarm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανιχνευτής/συναγερμός καπνού</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Description of the principle of operation of a smoke detector/alarm that uses ionising radiation. Diagrams and a simplified circuit are included.</string>
            <string language="es">Descripción del principio de funcionamiento de un detector/alarma de humos que utiliza radiación ionizante. Se incluyen diagramas y un circuito simplificado.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cur síos ar phrionsabal oibrithe brathadóir/aláram deataigh a úsáideann radaíocht ianaíoch. Áirítear léaráidí agus ciorcad simplí leis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
            <string language="es">Física. Notas</string>
            <string language="ga">Fisic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Notes</string>
            <string language="ga">Nótaí</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung der Grundregel der Operation eines 
Rauches detector/alarm, der ionisierende Strahlung verwendet. 
Diagramme und ein vereinfachter Stromkreis sind enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description du principe de fonctionnement d'une 
fumée detector/alarm qui utilise le rayonnement s'ionisant. Les
diagrammes et un circuit simplifié sont inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição do princípio de operação de um fumo
detector/alarm que use a radiação de ionização. Os diagramas
e um circuito simplificado são incluídos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione del principio di funzionamento di un 
fumo detector/alarm che usa la radiazione d'ionizzazione. Gli 
schemi e un circuito semplificato sono inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή της αρχής της λειτουργίας ενός 
ανιχνευτή/ενός συναγερμού καπνού που χρησιμοποιεί την 
ακτινοβολία ιονισμού. Τα διαγράμματα και ένα απλουστευμένο 
κύκλωμα συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anmerkungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Note</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημειώσεις</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
